mapper.insert: insert into community_board(ur_id,addr_cd,addr_no,commu_cd,commu_name, addr_name,title,contents, nick, img_full_rt, group_no) values (#{ur_id},#{addr_cd},#{addr_no},#{commu_cd},#{commu_name},#{addr_name},#{title},#{contents},#{nick},#{img_full_rt},#{group_no})
mapper.select: select * from community_board where ur_state = #{ur_state} order by r_date desc;
mapper.update: update community_board set title = #{title} , contents = #{contents},m_date = #{m_date} where no = #{no}
update community_board set view_cnt = view_cnt+1 where no=#{no}

UPDATE community_board b SET b.like_cnt = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_heart h WHERE h.post_no = b.no AND h.ur_state = 'y' ) WHERE b.like_cnt <> ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_heart h WHERE h.post_no = b.no AND h.ur_state = 'y' );
mapper.select: select b.no, c.name,b.title, b.nick, b.view_cnt, b.addr_name from community_board b join commu c on b.commu_cd = c.commu_cd order by view_cnt desc limit 10;
